patthana3.5:7.1: Nosaññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:8.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:10.1: Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:10.2: Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:10.3: Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo ca nosaññojano akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:12.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana3.5:15.1: Saññojano akusalo dhammo saññojanassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:20.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:23.1: Nosaññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:24.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:29.1: Saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:30.1: Asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:32.1: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukagamanaṃ, evaṃ imampi ñātabbaṃ. Sahajātavāropi … pe … pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.5:33.1: Saññojaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:34.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:38.1: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:39.1: Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:39.2: Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:39.3: Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato ca asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.5:40.1: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:41.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.5:44.1: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.5:45.1: Asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo asaññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:46.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.5:47.1: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:51.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:55.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:56.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:58.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:59.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.5:60.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.5:63.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.5:63.3: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.5:64.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.5:66.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.5:67.1: Saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.5:68.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana3.5:69.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:70.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.5:73.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:74.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:79.1: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:80.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:82.1: Saññojanañceva saññojaniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:83.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:84.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.5:86.1: Saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:87.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:91.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:93.1: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:94.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.5:98.1: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:99.1: Saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto ceva no ca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:100.1: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalañca saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:101.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:102.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.5:104.1: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:105.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.5:106.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava.
patthana3.5:109.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:112.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:113.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:114.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.5:115.1: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi … pe … pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.5:116.1: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:118.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.5:119.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:119.2: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:119.3: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato ca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.5:120.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.5:121.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.5:122.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte dve … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.5:124.1: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.5:125.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.5:129.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
